TopicTitle: Oh you know, the usual weekend stuff I post.

Articles.Content:
So here we are again.

It's always such a pleasure.

remember when you tried to un-subscribe.

oh how you laughed and laugh

only because i told you to.

under the circumstances i've been shockingly on time.

you want you few minutes back.

that's what i'm counting on.

i used to want you to subscribe, but now i only want you to watch.

All right enough of that.

here's the video.

-IMPORTANT BELOW-

I'm changing the schedule to.

Every other week is an episode, or some kind of video that's longer than two minutes.

in between would be something like this, and exercise of some kind to improve my animating skills

PS. PLEASE guess which clip is which, (as in which one did i do with what style).

First one is you renewed effort

I agree first one is yours

I agree first one is yours

Well, i'm not going to say at the time whether you're right or wrong,

But i'm glad to see people giving feedback

Here's a little image of a sculpting exercise i'm doing.

Yeah...

it's still WIP, thrown together in about 20 minutes.
great job I saw your first episode and cant wait to see the next good job!

Well, the moment you've been waiting for is here.

The first clip, i used the new method.

and the second clip is used my original method (mostly because i was running out of time for the day, and i didn't have time to do the second method)
I didn't notice the break between clips on the first watch through, i guess i was distracted by the awesome Rounded kerbal fingertips!

I didn't notice the break between clips on the first watch through, i guess i was distracted by the awesome Rounded kerbal fingertips!

Yes, i did do that to help give them a bit more of a "kerbal look"
